title: Rishi Sunak’s Challenge: Unifying the Party and Fixing the Economy
description: The Conservative Party is fractured and Britain’s public finances are battered. That will test the political skills of a leader who has been involved in national politics for only seven years.
dc:creator: Mark Landler
category: Charles III, King of the United Kingdom
media:description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak of Britain speaks outside 10 Downing Street after taking office on Tuesday.
